00010 namespace glm{
00011 
00012 template <typename genType>
00013 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType catmullRom
00014 (
00015         genType const & v1, 
00016         genType const & v2, 
00017         genType const & v3, 
00018         genType const & v4, 
00019         typename genType::value_type const & s
00020 )
00021 {
00022         typename genType::value_type s1 = s;
00023         typename genType::value_type s2 = pow2(s);
00024         typename genType::value_type s3 = pow3(s);
00025 
00026         typename genType::value_type f1 = -s3 + typename genType::value_type(2) * s2 - s;
00027         typename genType::value_type f2 = typename genType::value_type(3) * s3 - typename genType::value_type(5) * s2 + typename genType::value_type(2);
00028         typename genType::value_type f3 = typename genType::value_type(-3) * s3 + typename genType::value_type(4) * s2 + s;
00029         typename genType::value_type f4 = s3 - s2;
00030 
00031         return (f1 * v1 + f2 * v2 + f3 * v3 + f4 * v4) / typename genType::value_type(2);
00032 
00033 }
00034 
00035 template <typename genType>
00036 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType hermite
00037 (
00038         genType const & v1, 
00039         genType const & t1, 
00040         genType const & v2, 
00041         genType const & t2, 
00042         typename genType::value_type const & s
00043 )
00044 {
00045         typename genType::value_type s1 = s;
00046         typename genType::value_type s2 = pow2(s);
00047         typename genType::value_type s3 = pow3(s);
00048 
00049         typename genType::value_type f1 = typename genType::value_type(2) * s3 - typename genType::value_type(3) * s2 + typename genType::value_type(1);
00050         typename genType::value_type f2 = typename genType::value_type(-2) * s3 + typename genType::value_type(3) * s2;
00051         typename genType::value_type f3 = s3 - typename genType::value_type(2) * s2 + s;
00052         typename genType::value_type f4 = s3 - s2;
00053 
00054         return f1 * v1 + f2 * v2 + f3 * t1 + f4 * t2;
00055 }
00056 
00057 template <typename genType>
00058 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType cubic
00059 (
00060         genType const & v1, 
00061         genType const & v2, 
00062         genType const & v3, 
00063         genType const & v4, 
00064         typename genType::value_type const & s
00065 )
00066 {
00067         return ((v1 * s + v2) * s + v3) * s + v4;
00068 }

00070 }//namespace glm
